mobileoption.instructions: 1.Go to Airtel money Sim tool kit;2. Select Airtel money option;3. Select 'Make payments' option;4. Select 'Pay bill' option;5. Select 'Other' option;6. Enter the 'Business name' - 369369;7. Enter amount you want to pay - 6917;8. Enter your Airtel money PIN;9. Enter your reference R50333928;10. Press OK to send

1. Tigo will send you a prompt to enter your Tigo Pesa mobile money pin to approve the amount to be deducted. Enter the Tigo Pesa PIN.;2.You will receive an SMS confirmation of your transaction from Tigo Pesa.

1. Dial *150*00# ;2. Choose 4 - Lipa by M-Pesa ;3. Choose 4 - Enter business number ;4. Enter 500600 As BusinessNumber ;5. Enter reference number {PAYMENTTOKEN} ;6. Enter amount 117234;7. Enter PIN ;8. You will receive confirmation SMS

1. Dial *150*60# ;2. Choose 5-Make Payments ;3. Choose 1-Merchant Payments ;4. Choose 4-Pay with Mastercard QR ;5. Enter amount 117234 ;6. Enter Merchant Number {PAYMENTTOKEN} ;7. Enter PIN ;8. You will receive confirmation SMS
Shortly&#8218 you will receive a push prompt on your phone to enter your MoMo PIN and authorize the payment
1. Dial *150*88# ;2. Choose 5 - Pay Merchant ;3. Choose 3 - Selcom Pay/Masterpass ;4. Enter Pay Number {PAYMENTTOKEN} ;5. Enter amount 117234;6. Enter PIN ;7. You will receive confirmation SMS
1. Dial *150*71# ;2. Choose 6 - Pay Merchant ;3. Choose 2 - Selcom Pay/Masterpass ;4. Enter Pay Number {PAYMENTTOKEN} ;5. Enter amount 117234;6. Enter PIN ;7. You will receive confirmation SMS
1. Dial *150*02# ;2. Choose 5 - Pay Merchant ;3. Choose 2 - Selcom Pay/Masterpass ;4. Enter Pay Number {PAYMENTTOKEN} ;5. Enter amount 117234;6. Enter PIN ;7. You will receive confirmation SMS
Shortly&#8218 you will receive a push prompt on your phone to enter your Airtel PIN and authorize the payment
Shortly&#8218 you will receive a push prompt on your phone to enter your MoMo PIN and authorize the payment
Shortly&#8218 you will receive a push prompt on your phone to enter your MoMo PIN and authorize the payment

Dear Customer,; Shortly you will receive an M-PESA prompt on your phone requesting you to enter your M-PESA PIN to complete your payment. Please ensure your phone is on and unlocked to enable you to complete the process. Thank you.;; You can also pay using Lipa na MPESA by using the following instructions: ; 1.Go to the M-PESA menu; 2. Select Lipa na M-PESA; 3. Select the Paybill option; 4. Enter business number 927633; 5. Enter your account number R50333928; 6. Enter the amount 6917; 7. Enter PIN and press OK to send; 8. You will receive a confirmation SMS with your payment reference number.
1. MTN will send you a prompt to enter your mobile money pin to approve the amount to be deducted. Enter the Mobile Money PIN. 2. You will receive an SMS confirmation of your transaction from MTN.
1. Instructions for Orange Ivory Coast
Shortly&#8218 you will receive a push prompt on your phone to enter your Airtel PIN and authorize the payment

1. Dial *170# select Option 6, My Wallet;2. Select Option 3 for My Approvals..;3. Enter PIN to get your Pending Approval List.;4. Select pending transaction to approve.;5. Select Option 1 for YES to approve the transaction OR Option 2 for NO to reject the transaction.
Shortly&#8218 you will receive a push prompt on your phone to enter your MoMo PIN and authorize the payment

1. MTN will send you a prompt to enter your mobile money pin to approve the amount to be deducted. Enter the Mobile Money PIN.;2.You will receive an SMS confirmation of your transaction from MTN.;Should you not receive the prompt;1.Dial 165#;2.Select My Account;3.Select My Approvals;4.You will receive a prompt to approve the payment.
